DOC.brief_summary: PTSD ( posttraumatic stress disorder ) associate mental health condition affect veteran family member . This study investigate whether group therapy use EFT ( Emotional Freedom Techniques ) CBT ( Cognitive Behavior Therapy ) produce reduction PTSD comorbid symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Mental Health Veterans Families After Group Therapies
DOC.criteria: The ability follow instruction , complete write form , provide inform consent . Subjects require literate understand English . Physically healthy . Active duty military service , veteran , family member .
